description: This file contains CSS styles for the App component, defining theme management variables, layout styles, animations, and responsive design.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container for the application, styled with background color, text alignment, and responsive design.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application, centered with a background color and flexible layout.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link styles including color and transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling themes with styles for hover and active states.
